Name: IIS Website - HTTP to HTTPS Redirect
Description: Adds either a global or site specific rule which redirects from http to https
Author: perosb

Parameters.Name: Site
Parameters.Label: Name of Website
Parameters.HelpText:
Set the rule for a specific website.
If not supplied, a global rule will be created.

Parameters.Name: EnableProxyRules
Parameters.Label: Enable proxy rules
Parameters.HelpText: If the website is running behind a proxy, this setting most likely need to be checked.

Parameters.Name: Disabled
Parameters.Label: Disable
Parameters.HelpText:
Disable adding rules.
This will remove any rules mathing current values.
